watchlist.Title: Top Gun
watchlist.Actors: Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards
watchlist.Plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
watchlist.Writer: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr., Ehud Yonay (magazine article "Top Guns")

watchlist.Title: Jurassic Park
watchlist.Actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
watchlist.Plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
watchlist.Writer: Michael Crichton (novel), Michael Crichton (screenplay), David Koepp (screenplay)

watchlist.Title: Jungle Book
watchlist.Actors: Julian Bailey, Sonja Ball, Kathleen Fee, Jean Fontaine
watchlist.Plot: Watch Rudyard Kipling's world famous novel, The Jungle Book, come alive in this high quality entertaining animated feature for your kids and family. Join young Mowgli, and his animal ...

watchlist.Title: Mission: Impossible
watchlist.Actors: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle BÃ©art, Henry Czerny
watchlist.Plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.
watchlist.Writer: Bruce Geller (television series), David Koepp (story), Steven Zaillian (story), David Koepp (screenplay), Robert Towne (screenplay)

watchlist.Title: Forrest Gump
watchlist.Actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys
watchlist.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
